item.name: name
item.desc: Name of molecule in coarse-grained representation.

item.name: ident
item.desc: Molecule name in reference topology.

item.name: topology
item.desc: Section containing definition of coarse grained topology of molecule.

item.name: topology.cg_beads
item.desc: Section defining coarse grained beads of molecule.

item.name: topology.cg_beads.cg_bead
item.desc: Definition of a coarse grained bead.

item.name: topology.cg_beads.cg_bead.name
item.desc: Name of coarse grained bead.

item.name: topology.cg_beads.cg_bead.type
item.desc: Type of coarse grained bead.

item.name: topology.cg_beads.cg_bead.mapping
item.desc: Mapping scheme to be used for this bead (specified in section mapping) to map from reference system.

item.name: topology.cg_beads.cg_bead.beads
item.desc: The beads section lists all atoms of the reference system that are mapped to this particular coarse grained bead. The syntax is RESID:RESNAME:ATOMNAME, the beads are separated by spaces.

item.name: topology.cg_bonded
item.desc: The cg_bonded section contains all bonded interaction of the molecule. Those can be bond, angle or dihedral. An entry for each group of bonded interaction can be specified, e.g. several groups (types) of bonds can be specified. A specific bonded interaction can be later on addressed by MOLECULE:NAME:NUMBER, where MOLECULE is the molecule ID in the whole topology, NAME the name of the interaction group and NUMBER addresses the interaction in the group.

item.name: topology.cg_bonded.bond
item.desc: Definition of a group of bonds.

item.name: topology.cg_bonded.bond.name
item.desc: Name of the group.

item.name: topology.cg_bonded.bond.beads
item.desc: List of pair of beads that define a bond. Names specified in cg_beads, separated by commas.

item.name: topology.cg_bonded.angle
item.desc: Definition of a group of angles.

item.name: topology.cg_bonded.angle.name
item.desc: Name of the group.

item.name: topology.cg_bonded.angle.beads
item.desc: List of triples of beads that define a bond. Names specified in cg_beads, separated by commas.

item.name: topology.cg_bonded.dihedral
item.desc: Definition of a group of dihedrals. Since the exact functional form does not matter, this combines proper as well as improper dihedrals.

item.name: topology.cg_bonded.dihedral.name
item.desc: Name of the group.

item.name: topology.cg_bonded.dihedral.beads
item.desc: List of quadruples of beads that define a bond. Names specified in cg_beads, separated by commas.

item.name: maps
item.desc: Section containing definitions of mapping schemes.

item.name: maps.map
item.desc: Section for a mapping for 1 bead.

item.name: maps.map.name
item.desc: Name of the mapping.

item.name: maps.map.weights
item.desc: Weights of the mapping matrix. Entries are normalized to 1, number of entries must match the number of reference beads in a coarse-grained bead.
